tuv.seg: After a general election, the party with the support of the majority of the members in the Dáil will secure the nomination of Taoiseach who will then set up a government
In ndiaidh olltoghcháin, tá an deis ag an bpáirtí, ag a bhfuil tacaíocht tromlach baill na Dála, an Taoiseach a ainmniú agus ansin Rialtas a bhunú
If, after a general election, no party can get the support of the majority of the members of the Dáil, 2 or more parties may agree to work together as a coalition government
Má tharlaíonn sé, tar éis an olltoghcháin, nach bhfuil aon pháirtí amháin le tacaíocht ón tromlach is féidir le 2 pháirtí nó níos mó aontú ar oibriú le chéile chun an tír a rialú mar chomhrialtas
The coalition parties will agree on who will be nominated as Taoiseach
Beidh ar na páirtithe aontú ar an té a bheidh mar Thaoiseach orthu
Usually, it is the leader of the larger party
De ghnáth, is é/í ceannaire an pháirtí is mó a roghnaítear
In recent years, the practice has been to nominate the leader of the smaller party as Tánaiste
Le blianta beaga anuas roghnaítear ceannaire an pháirtí is lú mar Thánaiste
The ministerial portfolios will then be shared between the parties
Roinntear cúram na n-airí ansin ar an dá nó trí pháirtí
Usually the larger party will be given a greater number of portfolios
Tugtar, de ghnáth, níos nó díobh don pháirtí is mó
The leader of each party will decide which elected members of the party to allocate those portfolios to
Is iad ceannairí na bpáirtithe a shocraíonn cé dó/dí a thugtar na postanna mar airí i measc na mball tofa
The coalition government will remain in power for as long as it keeps the support of the majority of the Dáil
Bíonn an comhrialtas i gcumhacht an fhad agus a fhaigheann said tacaíocht ó thromlach na dTeachtaí Dála sa Dáil
If the coalition parties find that for some reason they cannot agree and can no longer work together, the Taoiseach may advise the President to dissolve the Dáil

Má tharlaíonn sé go bhfuil fáth éigin nach bhfuil na páirtithe éagsúla sa chomhrialtas ag aontú ar chúis éigin is féidir leis an Taoiseach dul chuig an Uachtarán agus iarraidh air/uirthi an Dáil a lánscoir
